mapper.select: SELECT goodsId,goodsName,categoryName,details,originalPrice,sellPrice,inventory,createDate FROM goods,category WHERE goods.categoryId=category.categoryId ORDER BY goods.originalPrice ASC;
SELECT goodsId,goodsName,categoryName,details,originalPrice,sellPrice,inventory,createDate FROM goods,category WHERE goods.categoryId=category.categoryId ORDER BY goods.originalPrice DESC;
SELECT goodsId,goodsName,categoryName,details,originalPrice,sellPrice,inventory,createDate FROM goods,category WHERE goods.categoryId=category.categoryId ORDER BY goods.sellPrice ASC;
SELECT goodsId,goodsName,categoryName,details,originalPrice,sellPrice,inventory,createDate FROM goods,category WHERE goods.categoryId=category.categoryId ORDER BY goods.sellPrice DESC;
SELECT goodsId,goodsName,categoryName,details,originalPrice,sellPrice,inventory,createDate FROM goods,category WHERE goods.categoryId=category.categoryId AND category.categoryName=#{categoryName};

SELECT goodsId,goodsName,categoryName,details,originalPrice,sellPrice,inventory,createDate FROM goods,category WHERE goods.categoryId=category.categoryId AND goodsName LIKE concat(concat('%',#{goodsName}),'%');
